import React from 'react' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import InputField from '../../components/Form/InputField'; import Button from '../../components/Form/Button'; import Label from '../../components/Form/Label'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Edit() { const { idno } = useParams(); const { register, handleSubmit, watch, formState: { errors } } = useForm({ defaultValues:{ idno: idno, firstname: '', lastname: '', image: '', username: '', password: '' } }); const onSubmit = data => console.log(data.idno); const firstname = watch('firstname'); const lastname = watch('lastname'); console.log('fname: ', firstname, 'lastname: ',lastname) return (
